title: Chapter VI - General Regulations
content:
Chapter VI - General Regulations

State Regulations

Part 615 - Environmental Quality Bond Act Equal Employment And Minority And Women-owned Business Enterprise Program Regulations (§ 615.1 to 615.10)

Part 616 - Access To Records

Part 617 - State Environmental Quality Review (§ 617.1 to 617.21)

Part 618 - Implementation Of State Environmental Quality Review Act (§ 618.1 to 618.14)

Part 619 - Applicability Of Regulations And Statutes (§ 619.1 to 619.4)

Part 620 - Procedures For Issuance Of Summary Abatement Orders (§ 620.1 to 620.4)

Part 621 - Uniform Procedures

Part 622 - Uniform Enforcement Hearing Procedures (§ 622.1 to 622.19)

Part 623 - Use Of Environmental Education Centers (§ 623.1)

Part 624 - Permit Hearing Procedures (§ 624.1 to 624.14)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
